relation.text: Sentenced to be Hang 'd for their several and respective Offences here in particularly specified . At Justice Hall in the Old-Baily , the 12th of Decemb . 1674
December , 1674 . AT this Sessions of Oier and Terminer for the City of London , and County of Middlesex , holden at Justice-Hall in the Old-Bayly , begun
continued till the 12th . of this Instant December , 1674
